name: Taigi Custom Font for Websites - Iansui
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
Taigi custom font for websites. Download and install the font here: https://github.com/ButTaiwan/iansui Kái chò Tâi-bûn jī-kut, hō͘ 1-kóa bāng-chām hián-sī iōng--ê. Chhiáⁿ seng kā jī-kut lia̍h--lo̍h-lâi, an-chng hó-sè: https://github.com/ButTaiwan/iansui
